sentences.en: A small difference between them will render the composite translucent.
sentences.cn: 微小的差别,也会使复合材料变成半透明.

sentences.en: Blue veins showed through her translucent skin.
sentences.cn: 她半透明的皮肤下青筋显现。

sentences.en: He relied on translucent enamels to produce vivid, glowing pictures.
sentences.cn: 他利用半透明瓷漆绘制出鲜艳生动的图画。

sentences.en: Her skin - for this was her sixth month with child - had acquired a wonderful translucent quality.
sentences.cn: 由于怀着六个月的身孕,她的皮肤变得异常光润.

sentences.en: In the ocean there was an abundance of minute and translucent, often phosphorescent, beings.
sentences.cn: 在海洋里有极多微小的半透明的时常发出闪闪磷光的东西.

sentences.en: Many glassreinforced composites are translucent when removed hot from the press.
sentences.cn: 许多玻璃增强复合材料从热的压机上取下时是透明的.

sentences.en: Mine was a picture of four translucent prawns, with two small fish swimming above them.
sentences.cn: 给我画的是四只虾, 半透明的,上画有两条小鱼.

sentences.en: One travel the glittering and translucent world, Donghai Sea!
sentences.cn: 晶莹世界, 东海一游!

sentences.en: Porcelain: Vitrified pottery with a white, fine - grained Body that is usually translucent.
sentences.cn: 瓷器: 一种用白色细颗粒的材料制成的通常为不透明的玻璃化陶瓷.

sentences.en: She had fair hair, blue eyes and translucent skin.
The building is roofed entirely with translucent corrugated plastic.
sentences.cn: 这座建筑完全用半透明瓦楞塑料封顶。

sentences.en: The color may change from translucent to yellowed and opaque.
sentences.cn: 颜色从半透明变为黄色不透明.

sentences.en: The sky was changing from translucent blue to thicker grey.
sentences.cn: 天空由通透的湛蓝色变成了暗灰色。

sentences.en: The surface of white or yellow light yellow - brown, translucent, ring - shaped section profile.
sentences.cn: 表面呈黄白色或淡黄棕色, 半透明, 有节 状 环纹.

sentences.en: This helps send power to the batteries, while maintaining a translucent appearance.
sentences.cn: 这有助于发送功率的电池, 同时保持半透明的外观.

phrases.tran_cn: 半透明纸，半透媒；不透明纸

trans.tran_cn: 半透明的，透亮的，有光泽的
trans.tran_en: not trans-parent, but clear enough to allow light to pass through
